headerDisplay:
Homebridge platform plugin for Eco and WION Wi-Fi modules and switches.

No Configuration Required.

This plugin allows you to remotely control the state of your Eco Plug. It allows you to set the on/off state. This plugin supports device auto discovery, and will scan the network for new devices every 60 seconds and add new devices.

name.title: Name
name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the Homebridge log
